concept.title: Connect to a database with a built-in driver in

conbody.p: The following example illustrates how to connect to a Postgre database that can be used in a whole project.

li.p: You have already set up your Postgre database.

conbody.p: To establish a connection, go to Project > Settings > Database. In Database:

ol.li: Select Secure User and Password to enable User and Password.
Input User name and Password used for authentication and Connection URL.

li.p: Click Test Connection to verify whether your database is connected successfully.

image.alt: Connect Database with a built-in driver

li.p: Click Apply and Close to save your setting.
